anya-e0105n31:1_1: tisso abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo attanā sadisanāmena sotatthakīganthakārakena buddhaghosabhikkhunā
anya-e0105n31:3: Bhikkhunā buddhaghosena, sakkaccaṁ abhiyācito’’ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:5: Ayaṁ aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathā’’ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:8: Yaṁ ārabhiṁ racayituṁ, aṭṭhakathaṁ sunipuṇesu atthesu;
anya-e0105n31:9: Sammohavinodanato, sammohavinodaniṁ nāmā’’ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:11: Ayaṁ sammohavinodanī nāma vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathā’’ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:12_0: Imāsu pana tīsu pañcapakaraṇaṭṭhakathāya nāmaviseso natthi āyācako ca na pakāsito,
anya-e0105n31:12_1: kevalaṁ attano saddhāya eva sañcoditena ācariyabuddhaghosena sā katā viya dissati.
anya-e0105n31:16: Saddhāya samāraddhā, yā aṭṭhakathā mayā tassāti ca.
anya-e0105n31:20: Tassa aṭṭhakathā esā, sakalassāpi niṭṭhitā’’ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n31:22: Ayaṁ sakalassapi abhidhammapiṭakassa aṭṭhakathā’’ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n31:23_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā therā ‘‘abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ācariyabuddhaghosena yācito saṅghapālabuddhamittajotipālādīnaṁ
anya-e0105n31:23_1: aññataro thero akāsī’’ti vadanti. Ayañca nesaṁ vicāraṇā, aṭṭhasālinīsammohavinodanīsu
anya-e0105n31:23_2: ‘‘tā buddhaghosena yācito akāsī’’ti ganthakārena vuttaṁ. Tena ñāyati ‘‘takkārako
anya-e0105n31:23_3: añño, ācariyabuddhaghoso pana tāsu yācakapuggaloyevā’’ti. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu ca ācariyabuddhaghosena –
anya-e0105n31:25: Iti pana sabbaṁ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṁ;
anya-e0105n31:26: Vuttaṁ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṁ idha vicārayissāmī’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n31:27: Evaṁ sīlakathādīnaṁ attanā eva visuddhimagge vuttabhāvo mayātipadena pakāsito. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pana –
anya-e0105n31:29: Visuddhimagge panidaṁ, yasmā sabbaṁ pakāsita’’nti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n31:30_0: Evaṁ mayāti kattupadena vinā vuttaṁ. Tenāpi ñāyati ‘‘visuddhimaggakārako añño, abhidhammaṭṭhakathākārako
anya-e0105n31:30_1: añño’’ti. Kiñcāpi abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso bhikkhunāti ca yatināti
anya-e0105n31:30_2: ca imeheva sāmaññaguṇapadehi vutto na therenāti sagāravaguṇapadena, tathāpi so ‘‘visuddhācārasīlena
anya-e0105n31:30_3: nipuṇāmalabuddhinā’’ti ca, ‘‘adandhagatinā subuddhinā’’ti ca imehi adhikaguṇapadehi
anya-e0105n31:30_4: thomitattā ‘‘visuddhimaggādikārako ācariyabuddhaghosoyevā’’ti sakkā gahetuṁ. So hi
anya-e0105n31:30_6: kāle ūnadasavasso bhaveyya, tasmā therenāti na vuttoti sakkā gahetunti.
anya-e0105n31:31_0: Taṁ pana tesaṁ ativicāraṇamattameva. Na hi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero ‘‘tasmiṁ kāle
anya-e0105n31:31_1: ūnadasavasso’’ti sakkā gahetuṁ, visuddhimagganigamanepi ‘‘buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
anya-e0105n31:31_2: therenā’’ti vacanato, na ca ‘‘visuddhācārasīlena, nipuṇāmalabuddhinā’’ti vā, ‘‘adandhagatinā
anya-e0105n31:31_3: subuddhinā’’ti vā ettakeheva dvīhi dvīhi guṇapadehi thomanena suthomito hoti, aññadatthu
anya-e0105n31:31_4: ‘‘nippabhīkatakhajjoto samudeti divākaro’’ti thomanaṁ viya hoti. Nanu ācariyena attano ganthanigamanesu –
anya-e0105n31:33_0: Attano anucchavikāni guṇapadāni pakāsitāni, soyeva ca porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo saṅkhipitvā
anya-e0105n31:33_1: abhinavasaṅgahaṭṭhakathānaṁ ādikattā pubbaṅgamo, aññe pana abhinavaṭṭhakathākārā
anya-e0105n31:33_2: tasseva anuvattitvā avasesamekaṁ vā dve vā aṭṭhakathāyo akaṁsu. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0105n31:33_3: ca yo yo attho visuddhimagge vutto, so so yathānuppattaṭṭhāne tato gahetvā tatheva
anya-e0105n31:33_5: jhānakathāvaṇṇanāsu ca ayamattho ativiya pākaṭo, yopi ca tattha appako katipayamatto
anya-e0105n31:33_6: visuddhimaggena visadiso saṁvaṇṇanābhedo dissati, sopi ābhidhammikānaṁ matānusārena
anya-e0105n31:33_7: yathā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vutto, tatheva vuttoti veditabbo. Yathā ca aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ
anya-e0105n31:33_8: samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya atideso dissati dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1 akusalakammapathakathā,
anya-e0105n31:33_9: tatheva samantapāsādikāyampi aṭṭhasāliniyā atideso dissateva pārā. aṭṭha. 1.11;.
anya-e0105n31:33_10: Yadi ca aṭṭhasālinī aññena katā bhaveyya, kathaṁ tāsu aññamaññātideso sakkā kātuṁ.
anya-e0105n31:33_11: Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso ācariyena samānanāmo cūḷabuddhaghosoti
anya-e0105n31:33_12: yāvajjatanā ācariyaparamparāya gahito sotatthakīganthakārako aññoyeva, na ācariyamahābuddhaghosatthero.
anya-e0105n31:34_0: Yadi pana ettakena niṭṭhaṁ na gaccheyya, evampi vicāretabbaṁ – kinnu kho saṅghapālādayo
anya-e0105n31:34_1: therā visuddhimaggādīnaṁ karaṇatthāya ācariyabuddhaghosattheraṁ āyācamānā attanā
anya-e0105n31:34_2: samatthataroti saddahantā āyācanti udāhu asaddahantāti? Saddahantāyeva āyācantīti
anya-e0105n31:34_3: pākaṭoyevāyamattho. Tathā ca sati ācariyabuddhaghosatthero sayaṁ aññehi samatthatarova
anya-e0105n31:34_4: samāno kasmā aññaṁ āyāceyya. Na hi saddhāsampannassa thāmasampannassa yobbanasampannassa
anya-e0105n31:34_5: ācariyassa sundarataraṁ abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṁ kātuṁ bhāriyaṁ bhavissati. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0105n31:34_7: honti. Yadi ca abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṁ añño kareyya, kathamapi tāhi vacanākārassa visadisatā
anya-e0105n31:34_8: bhaveyya eva. Etāsaṁ nigamane ca dassitena ‘‘buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
anya-e0105n31:34_9: therena katā’’ti vacanena ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghosena katā’’tveva pākaṭā honti, na aññenāti.
anya-e0105n31:34_10: Yepi ‘‘aññena katā’’ti vadanti, tepi ‘‘iminā nāma therenā’’ti ekaṁsato dassetuṁ na
anya-e0105n31:34_11: sakkonti, tathā dassetuñca lesamattampi sādhakavacanaṁ na dissati. Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyopi
anya-e0105n31:34_12: idāni ācariyehi cūḷabuddhaghosoti voharitena buddhaghosena nāma bhikkhunāyācito visuddhimaggavinayāgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ
anya-e0105n31:35: Yaṁ pana mahāvaṁse ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso sīhaḷadīpāgamanato pubbe jambudīpe vasanakāleyeva aṭṭhasāliniṁ akāsī’’ti adhippāyena –
anya-e0105n31:37_0: Vuttaṁ, taṁ idāni dissamānāya aṭṭhasāliniyā na sameti. Tattha hi ganthārambheyeva
anya-e0105n31:37_1: visuddhimaggaṁ atidisitvā pacchāpi so ca, samantapāsādikā ca bahūsu ṭhānesu atidisīyanti.
anya-e0105n31:37_2: Tasmā tassā ācariyena sīhaḷadīpaṁ patvā visuddhimaggañceva samantapāsādikañca katvā
